name: Lebanese Bean Salad
author: slave2satan
summary: Quick, easy, and tasty. Can be used as a side dish or a snack on it's own. Great as a salad topper. Good with sea salt kettle chips, or toast.
ingredients: 1 (15 ounce) can fava beans, drained and rinsed
1 (15 ounce) can chickpeas, drained and rinsed
1 (15.5 ounce) can white beans, drained and rinsed
¼ cup chopped flat leaf parsley, or more to taste
kosher salt and ground black pepper to taste
directions: Mix fava beans, chickpeas, white beans, parsley, olive oil, garlic, and lemon juice together in a bowl
Season with kosher salt and black pepper
Chill and marinate in refrigerator for at least 2 hours
